===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr}}
[[ビール]] from {{etyl|nl|ja|sort=ひいる'}} {{m|nl|bier}}. The [[kanji]], literally meaning "[[麦|barley]] [[酒|wine]]", were applied from the Edo period.

====Pronunciation====

====Noun====

# [[beer]]

=====Usage notes=====
* Usually written in katakana as {{ja-r|ビール}}. The kanji spelling may be found in certain contexts such as beer labels.
